name: url-downloader-ext
author: Zach K
description: Downloads urls from the clipboard into the selected curation.

com.curator-tools.downloader.concurrency.title: Concurrency
com.curator-tools.downloader.concurrency.description: The maximum number of concurrent requests the downloader can make at a time.

com.curator-tools.downloader.downgrade.title: Downgrade Requests
com.curator-tools.downloader.downgrade.description: Downgrades all requests with extra data (like POST) into no-data GET requests.

com.curator-tools.downloader.wayback.title: Rename Wayback URLs
com.curator-tools.downloader.wayback.description: Puts files downloaded from wayback back into their original domains.

com.curator-tools.downloader.keep-vars.title: Keep Vars
com.curator-tools.downloader.keep-vars.description: Includes url parameters in the filename, replacing ? with @.

com.curator-tools.downloader.duplicates.title: Duplicate Files
com.curator-tools.downloader.duplicates.description: When the same file is requested twice with different data, save it into different spots.
